name: Helsings Hunt: A Stab in the Dark
overview: A game made for the mini Ludum Dare #45 by Goerp in 2013. I am the monster breathing men fear, do you believe you can hurt me with your weapons? You have slim chance against the hordes of undead in our Transylvanian strongholds? Your life may depend on it. May the undead be killed forever! Helsing is going straight for the heart of Dracula, but first he needs to defeat his minions. Black as the night they are invisible, luckily lightning will briefly expose them. Thrust the stake by pressing the space bar. You get only one stab per vampire.
